title: Stepfather fired shot that wounded New Orleans boy, police say
content:
The stepfather of an 11-year-old boy who was wounded by gunfire Saturday afternoon (Nov. 5) in the St. Claude neighborhood has been arrested in what New Orleans police now call an accidental shooting. Shawn Turner, 22, was booked with negligent injuring, illegal use of a weapon and flight from an officer.
Investigators determined Turner "accidentally discharged the weapon while handling the gun," the Police Department said. The boy received a "through and through" wound that left him in stable condition. He is expected to be released from the hospital on Sunday.
The shooting occured just before 1:30 p.m. in the 1400 block of Independence Street.
Information about the condition of the victim, who was shot multiple times, has not been released.
